S3Tag.description: Specifies the key-value pair that are assigned to a file during the execution of a Tagging step.

Key.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.
Key.markdownDescription:
The name assigned to the tag that you create.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value that corresponds to the key.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value that corresponds to the key.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

S3Tag.markdownDescription:
Specifies the key-value pair that are assigned to a file during the execution of a Tagging step.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EfsInputFileLocation.description: Specifies the details for an EFS file.

FileSystemId.description: Specifies the EFS filesystem that contains the file.
FileSystemId.markdownDescription:
Specifies the EFS filesystem that contains the file.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(arn:aws[-a-z]*:elasticfilesystem:[0-9a-z-:]+:(access-point/fsap|file-system/fs)-[0-9a-f]{8,40}|fs(ap)?-[0-9a-f]{8,40})$  
Update requires: No interruption

Path.description: The name assigned to the file when it was created in EFS. You use the object path to retrieve the object.
Path.markdownDescription:
The name assigned to the file when it was created in EFS. You use the object path to retrieve the object.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 65536  
Pattern: ^[^\x00]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

EfsInputFileLocation.markdownDescription:
Specifies the details for an EFS file.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

S3InputFileLocation.description: Specifies the details for a S3 file.

Bucket.description: Specifies the S3 bucket that contains the file.
Bucket.markdownDescription:
Specifies the S3 bucket that contains the file.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-z0-9][\.\-a-z0-9]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The name assigned to the file when it was created in S3. You use the object key to retrieve the object.
Key.markdownDescription:
The name assigned to the file when it was created in S3. You use the object key to retrieve the object.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: .*  
Update requires: No interruption

Specifies the details for a S3 file.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Maximum Length: 256
